description:
Ideamotive is an agile software development company based in the heart of Europe, in Warsaw, Poland working with startups, scaleups, and corporations.
We are experts in Web & Mobile technologies and outstanding interactive UX/UI design. You bring the idea, and we’ll bring our technical expertise to make it a reality.
Whether you’re a startup or a multi-national, we have the expertise to build your project. We can develop MVPs, scalable technical platforms, mobile applications and more. We can also become an extension of your in-house development team.
See our projects on https://dribbble.com/ideamotive

Web applications: Ruby on Rails, React, Ruby, JavaScript
Mobile apps: iOS, Android, React Native
UX/UI design
Custom software development

DevOps, Cloud
IT Consulting

Digital Product MVP delivery package
